scripts.oCamNode package¶

Submodules¶

scripts.oCamNode.oCam_image_node module¶

The oCamImageNode connects to an oCam camera and publishes the image feed

This node is intended to be used with an oCam camera. Currently it has only been tested with an oCam 5CRO-U found here http://withrobot.com/en/camera/ocam-5cro-u/

Sets up the camera with the provided configuration values and publishes Image messages to the topic “image”.

Note for INDEX:
Index# - (colormode, width, height, fps) 0 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 2592L, 1944L, 7) 1 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 2592L, 1944L, 3) 2 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 1920L, 1080L, 15) 3 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 1920L, 1080L, 7) 4 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 1280L, 960L, 30) 5 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 1280L, 960L, 15) 6 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 1280L, 720L, 30) 7 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 1280L, 720L, 15) 8 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 640L, 480L, 120) 9 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 640L, 480L, 90) 10 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 640L, 480L, 60) 11 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 640L, 480L, 30) 12 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 320L, 240L, 120) 13 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 320L, 240L, 90) 14 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 320L, 240L, 60) 15 - (‘YUYV 4:2:2’, 320L, 240L, 30) 16 - (‘Motion-JPEG’, 1920L, 1080L, 30) 17 - (‘Motion-JPEG’, 1920L, 1080L, 15) 18 - (‘Motion-JPEG’, 1280L, 720L, 45) 19 - (‘Motion-JPEG’, 1280L, 720L, 30) 20 - (‘Motion-JPEG’, 1280L, 720L, 15) 21 - (‘Motion-JPEG’, 640L, 480L, 30) 22 - (‘Motion-JPEG’, 640L, 480L, 15)
ROS Parameters:

saturation (int): camera saturation value [0, 8]

contrast (int): camera contrast value [0, 8]

brightness (int): camera brightness value [-4, 4]

exposure (int): camera exposure value [0, 10]

playtime (int): duration of camera feed. 0 for infinite.

cutting (float): percentage of horizontal camera cut. [0.0, 1.0]

index (int): camera resolutions & fps setting. See note above. Beware that
this can change with firmware updates (although newest is 2 years old)
camera_number (int): choose camera device, in case of more than one
oCam connected [0, n-1]
encoding (string): camera encoding to transform from CV2 to
ROS Image topic type. Options can be found here http://wiki.ros.org/cv_bridge/Tutorials/ConvertingBetweenROSImagesAndOpenCVImagesPython
Publishers:
image (sensor_msgs/Image): the output image
class scripts.oCamNode.oCam_image_node.oCamNode[source]¶

ROS implementation for an oCam connection

publish()[source]¶

Transforms from CV2 image to ROS Image and publishes topic
